title: (x) Wide sans on "Bossasession" album - PL Brazilia {Angel}
content:
Hello,

I'm searching for the name of the bossasession album font. Thanks for your help !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bossasession.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823182617/http:/typophile.com/files/bossasession.jpg) | 15.86 KB |
author: Moon Palace

comments.content: Looks like Helvetica Neue Extended with tight tracking...
Mmmh... yes... Now that you said it ;-)... Thanks !
Nope. Not Helvetica. The a doesn’t have a spur here.

Could this be a squooshed Chalet 1960 from House?

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823182617/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts")

Not [Paralucent](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823182617/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/device_fonts/paralucent_medium/?sample_text=bossasession&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1), but the spacing and width make it similar.
PL Brazilia indeed. Allow me to [quote myself](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823182617/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31173): _"(…) possibly my favouritest extended grotesque"._ ;^)

Brazilia - how appropriate for Bossa Nova.

Hmm. The italics haven't been closed on this thread...
